e1.name: Culture
e1.desc: A lot of cyber-related stuff such as well-know threats to increase your knowledge about cybersecurity.

e1.name: Tools
e1.desc: A list of tools that you may use either to defend or attack.

Attacks.name: Server Security
Attacks.desc: Some knowledge related to how hackers can exploit your server, along with notes to prevent such things.

Attacks.desc: Some knowledge related to how hackers can exploit your website, along with notes to prevent such things.

Attacks.name: Database Security
Attacks.desc: Some knowledge related to how hackers can exploit your database, along with notes to prevent such things.

Cryptography.name: OLD
Cryptography.desc: An introduction to cryptography (Modular arithmetic, encryption, and decryption of messages, RSA)
